00073 inline const Equation_base& Assembleur_P_VEF::equation() const
00074 {
00075   if (mon_equation.non_nul()==0)
00076     {
00077       Cerr << "\nError in Assembleur_P_VEF::equation() : The equation is unknown !" << finl;
00078       Process::exit();
00079     }
00080   return  mon_equation.valeur();
00081 }
